name: test-yarn2
description: Tests for dictionaries included by a Yarn 2 repository

scripts.prepare-yarn3: pnpm run prepare-yarn3-med && pnpm run prepare-yarn3-sci
scripts.test-yarn3: pnpm run test-yarn3-med && pnpm run test-yarn3-sci
scripts.test-yarn3-med: cd test-yarn3-med && corepack yarn && corepack yarn test
scripts.test-yarn3-sci: cd test-yarn3-sci && corepack yarn && corepack yarn test
